articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Gautam Adani replaces Mukesh Ambani as richest Asian - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Gautam Adani is now ranked as the 11th richest in the world with a net worth of $111 billion.
articles.content: Billionaire Gautam Adani has once again surpassed Reliance Industries head Mukesh Ambani to become the richest person in Asia after a surge in stock price of the listed companies in his conglomerate,… [+2491 chars]
